name: RWBY: Grimm Eclipse
summary:
RWBY: Grimm Eclipse is a 4 player Co-op, hack-n-slash game based upon Rooster Teeth’s international hit series RWBY.

Get ready for intense combat action as you battle Grimm across familiar locations of Remnant including new areas never before seen in the show. Play as Ruby, Weiss, Blake, and Yang in this character-driven adventure that explores new storylines, new Grimm types, and a new villain!

The gameplay takes inspiration from games such as Dynasty Warriors and Left 4 Dead offering over-the-top combat along with engaging missions and storytelling.

name: RWBY: Amity Arena
summary: RWBY: Amity Arena was a real-time strategic duel mobile game developed by NHN Entertainment and published by Rooster Teeth Productions based on Rooster Teeth's anime-style web series RWBY.

name: RWBY Deckbuilding Game
summary: RWBY Deckbuilding Game is a new breed of digital card game where you build your deck to defeat an array of deadly foes or join forces in raids to take down powerful villains. No packs or boosters to chase. Each expansion is a complete experience.

name: RWBY: Crystal Match
summary:
RWBY: Crystal Match is a free-to-play puzzle fighter game created in partnership with EGLS Technology. The match-three style puzzler is based on all three seasons of the RWBY Chibi series!

RWBY: Crystal Match features fan-favorite characters from the series, including Ruby, Weiss, Blake, Yang, and Team JNPR!

name: RWBY: Grimm Eclipse - Definitive Edition
summary:
The definitive RWBY experience is now on Nintendo Switch - including three years of content updates and DLC, eight all-new outfits, and a two-player couch co-op.

RWBY: Grimm Eclipse is a co-op, hack-and-slash game for up to four players based upon Rooster Teeth’s international hit series RWBY. Join your friends in intense combat action as one of eight students of Beacon Academy and stop the evil forces of the Grimm and Doctor Merlot. Level up your favorite RWBY character and traverse Remnant in new storylines or the Grimm Gauntlet mode.

name: RWBY: Arrowfell
summary:
Occurring during the events of RWBY Volume 7, players will take control of Team RWBY and switch between them on the fly in solo or multiplayer action (local or online) as they use their trademark weapons and semblances to stop a mysterious new threat in this side-scrolling, 2D adventure.

As players explore Atlas, Mantle, and numerous surrounding environments, they will face off against the Creatures of Grimm and other enemies straight from the show, as well as never-before-seen threats. The team also crosses paths with familiar faces including General Ironwood and the Ace Operatives, plus a fearless new group of Huntresses known as Team BRIR.

name: RWBY Fading Light
summary: Hack'n'Slash your way across Remant with the 4 Huntresses of team RWBY experience the beginning of their journey.

name: Rwen's Day Out
summary: A mundane visual novel about dragons hanging out.

name: RWBY: Vale of Darkness
summary: RWBY: Vale of Darkness is an RPGMaker fangame taking place during the first two Volumes of RWBY, with a new protagonist and a Persona-style social life system,

name: R Wheel
summary: R Wheel is a fast-pased one-button game. Try to survive inside a spinning wheel with spikes. Press a button to jump and hold a button to stay in the air longer. But your jumps release a wave that spawns the spikes. Collect bonus items to release a wave that clears the spikes and score points by clearing them. The game is over when you hit the spikes.

name: RWBY: Grimm Eclipse - JNPR
summary:
Four (4) new playable characters come to RWBY: Grimm Eclipse. Includes all of Team JNPR - Jaune Arc, Nora Valkyrie, Pyrrha Nikos, and Lie Ren.

Features:
* 4 new characters playable in all game modes including the story campaign.
* Fully voiced by the show's cast

name: RWSD
summary: RVSD is an FPV drone simulator with a campaign. Control scout, kamikaze, spotter, bomber, and interceptor drones. Customize your loadout, avoid air defenses and jamming, and hit ground and naval targets.
